info.name: apply_image_classifier
info.description:
A module that uses an eta.core.learning.ImageClassifier to classify images
or the frames of videos

inputs.name: input_image_set_labels_path
inputs.description: an optional input ImageSetLabels file to which to add the predictions generated by processing images_dir

inputs.name: input_labels_path
inputs.description: an optional input VideoLabels file to which to add the predictions generated by processing video_path

inputs.name: input_image_labels_path
inputs.description: an optional input ImageLabels files to which to add the predictions generated by processing image_path

outputs.name: output_image_set_labels_path
outputs.description: an ImageSetLabels file containing the predictions generated by processing images_dir

outputs.name: output_image_labels_path
outputs.description: an ImageLabels file containing the predictions generated by processing image_path

outputs.name: output_labels_path
outputs.description: a VideoLabels file containing the predictions generated by processing video_path

parameters.name: confidence_threshold
parameters.description: a confidence threshold to use when assigning labels

parameters.name: classifier
parameters.description: an eta.core.learning.ImageClassifierConfig describing the eta.core.learning.ImageClassifier to use
